Name: Coffee Coolatta
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of float white tea & coconut foam ( make foam using cream whipper with equal parts brewed cold white tea and coconut milk with egg white as protein) .
Review: A dry (some may want to add a touch of sugar syrup) bourbon laced coffee cocktail resplendent with a moustache challenging white tea & coconut head.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Chris Amirault at Otium in Los Angeles, California.
Nutrition: One serving of Coffee Coolatta contains 163 calories
